rows.label: qst200302_msg0001
rows.name:
The rockfall's happened at Zalmor's
Crevice, near the Genbu Drifts.

rows.label: qst200302_msg0002
rows.name:
Please! Go save my friends!
They'll be doomed without you!

rows.label: qst200302_msg0101
rows.name:
To think the rockfall was caused
by a Gogol... I can hardly believe it.

rows.label: qst200302_msg0102
rows.name:
We just had a Gogol show up
right here in Teos Aure, you see.
Went on a proper rampage.

rows.label: qst200302_msg0103
rows.name:
I'm afraid I don't know where
it's got to now, though...

rows.label: qst200302_msg0104
rows.name: You could try asking around the city?

rows.label: qst200302_msg0201
rows.name: It looks like the Gogol fled the city.

rows.label: qst200302_msg0202
rows.name:
Maybe you could try tracking
it down by its footprints?

rows.label: qst200302_msg0203
rows.name:
If it's the same Gogol that's been
causing rockfalls and attacking cities,
we can't just leave it running loose.

rows.label: qst200302_msg0204
rows.name:
You have to defeat that Gogol
so we can live in safety again!
